name: NETXP LINUX T1081 String Search Commands used
description: Monitors string search commands, including grep, egrep, ugrep, bgrep, rg, cgrep, ngrep, vgrep, pt, ucg, ag, ack, and semgrep. Detection of these commands helps in identifying potential instances of sensitive information or credentials stored in files.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "string_search" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
